ProcessTemplates.Name: Copy multiple files from local fileshare to SFTP server
ProcessTemplates.Description: This Process will read all files from the fileshare that match the file mask, and move them without any processing to an SFTP location.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"InFilePath":{"Value":"\"/frends-shared-data/\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Path of the files to be copied."},"InFileMask":{"Value":"\"*.*\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Mask for the files to be copied."},"TargetFilePath":{"Value":"\"/\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Target path where the files will be copied to."},"TargetServerAddress":{"Value":"\"frendstemplates.blob.core.windows.net\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Target SFTP Server Address."},"TargetServerUser":{"Value":"\"frendstemplates.sftp.frendstemplates\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Target SFTP Server User."},"TargetServerPassword":{"Value":"\"OinLoo6QEssEYzvqokPv6eJD8KUh2K4X\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"Target SFTP Server User's Password."}}

Process.Name: Copy multiple files from local fileshare to SFTP server
Process.Description: This Process will read all files from the fileshare that match the file mask, and move them without any processing to an SFTP location.
